channel.title: I need an ::object command, to spawn an object
channel.description:
I just want the command to be able to spawn an object where i'm standing. It doesen't need to be there forever w/e i just need it to be able to test out some objects without restarting the server. I know that was possible on rsc but not sure about rs2.
Thanks!

item.title: I need an ::object command, to spawn an object
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

		if(command.startsWith("makeobj") && playerRights >= 3){
		try
			{
			int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8));
			AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, id, 0, 10);

			}
			catch(Exception e) 
			{
			sendMessage("Bad Object ID"); 
			}	
		}

Read full topic
